entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
